physical_techniques.elemental_analysis: Service Central d’Analyse du CNRS in Vernaisson (France)

crystal_structure_data_collection_and_re.crystal_data_for_1: C12H21Cr2MnN4O26.5, hexagonal, space group P6522, a = 19.411(2) Å, c = 16.0339(12) Å, V = 5232.0(15) Å3, T = 200(1) K, λ = 0.71073 Å, Z = 6, ρcalc = 1.491 g.cm-3, μ = 1.062 mm-1, Flack parameter = 0.01(4), 5096 unique reflections and 3681 observed with I > 2σ(I).

proton_conductivity_measurements.sample_preparation: powdered sample was compressed into diameter of 7 mm and thickness of 0.10 cm
proton_conductivity_measurements.humidity_control: using dry N2 that had been passed through water or a saturated aqueous solution of NaBr

magnetic_measurements.corrections: for the diamagnetism of the constituent atoms and the sample holder
